alert.note: Alert for Bladen (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 2:51PM EDT until July 03 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Bladen County in southeastern North Carolina... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Elkton, or 8 miles south of Elizabethtown, moving to the east, northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Rowan, Carvers, Lisbon, Lagoon, Elkton, Emerson, Clarkton and White Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
